subHeading: WHERE SERVICE MEMBERS TURN FOR TRUSTED CIVILIAN ATTORNEYS
valueProp: Patriots Law Group of Lyons & Hughes, P.C. was formed by lawyers who served in the military. Through our military experience, we understand duty often calls us far from home where we may not know where to turn when a legal matter arises. Patriots Law Group solves this common military problem and provides clients – like you – with top notch lawyers that know what it means to serve. No matter your case, you can trust Patriots Law Group to resolve your legal problem.

testimonalData.text: Outstanding recent experience with the Patriots Law Group! My husband and I turned to this firm with a very thorny commercial issue.
Pat Hughes came highly recommended and did not disappoint. He was able to get my GOMOR and UIF rescinded.

I was fortunate to achieve the rank of Chief Master Sergeant in the United States Air Force and served for over 28 years. However, I faced a serious legal issue and Patriots Law Group saved my life and my retirement.
